---
title: "r-exploring"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)

skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(data = diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point(color = "cornflowerblue") +
  theme_light()
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "darkgrey", fill = "lightpink2")
```
